review: I have booked an appointment and I had visited the hospital. ****** *** ****** **** **** *** he had done the check up. I had a surgery done before so I had visited for just normal check up. I am over all satisfied with the treatment provided by the doctor and I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.

I visited to Doctor to take opinion regarding implantation of Pacemaker as other Doctor suggested for it but he had not explained the reason and other things. Dr Vineet carefully listen the issue and explained us for requirement of the pacemaker and further he implanted Pacemaker on 05th Nov 2019. Post implantation father discharged and he was fine, on 18th Nov he complained for fever Doctor immediately attended us and suggest for admission. During admission a lot of investigation done but no infection noticed. His overall support during entire investigation was excellent. First time I had seen that a doctor is taking so much step at their own and totally concern about his patient. His behavior is very polite and he is always contactable to his patient.
Thank you Dr Vineet for all your support during admission till discharge of my Father.

I recommend to everyone for any Cardio issue to Dr Vineet Bhatia.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a good experience. Dr. Bhatia is very attentive and appears to be very concerned about his patients.  He enquire thourouly about the problem.

review: Even after several tests worth tens of thousands of rupees and several days of follow-ups, ******** ****** *** *** ***** ** *** ***** **** *********** **** ****** Had to switch to another doctor.

I have taken appointment for my routine check up and visited the hospital. Doctor was  quite good and he had done the check up, there was no wait time for in hospital as it was on time. I am completely 100% satisfied with his treatment and any one needs consultation means I would like to recommend this doctor only.
